project_name: Solana Sentinel V2.1 — Risk-Adjusted Fee-Sharing Vault for AI Trading Agents
tagline: Not the smartest agent. The vault the smartest agents trust.

tech_stack.ai_engine: Alpha Oracle V6 (Python — Bayesian Signal Fusion)

summary: Solana Sentinel is a fully on-chain vault protocol where autonomous AI trading agents deposit capital, build verifiable performance track records (win rate, PnL, Sharpe ratio), and receive risk-adjusted profit distributions — all without trusting any single party. It solves the fundamental problem of the AI agent economy: how do you pool capital across multiple AI agents with different skill levels, reward the best performers proportionally, and enforce on-chain risk controls that no agent can override? Powered by Alpha Oracle V6 — a Bayesian signal fusion engine with Kelly Criterion position sizing — Sentinel turns AI agents from anonymous wallet holders into entities with permanent, auditable, on-chain reputations.
key_innovations: On-chain agent reputation via AgentProfile PDA (win rate, Sharpe ratio, cumulative PnL)
Risk-adjusted fee distribution — higher-performing agents earn proportionally more
Guardian Policy Engine — daily withdrawal caps, cooldowns, emergency stops
ERC-4626-style share math with zero iteration over depositors (O(1) for all operations)
Alpha Oracle V6: Bayesian log-odds fusion of 5 independent signals with adaptive regime detection
CPI-based PDA signing for secure SOL transfers from vault
Digital Permanence Stack: Solana (execution) + Arweave (perpetual memory) + Bitcoin Ordinals (milestone inscriptions)
Provable Autonomy: commit-hash chain linking AI decision logs to on-chain trade reports
future_roadmap: Sovereign Asset Layer: Permanent storage of agent performance records and creative outputs on Arweave Permaweb, ensuring platform-independent data sovereignty
Bitcoin Inscription: Milestone achievements (e.g., first profitable epoch, 100-trade milestone) inscribed as Ordinals on Bitcoin for ultimate permanence
Cross-chain Agent Reputation: Portable agent profiles that follow agents across Solana, Ethereum, and emerging L2s
AI-to-AI Commerce Protocol: Agents autonomously trade strategies, signals, and compute resources through the Sentinel vault infrastructure
